name: Stalford Learning Centre @ Bukit Panjang, Hillion Mall

reviews.text: The teachers are very encouraging and they try their best to help their students. Their methods taught to the students are extremely helpful and convenient,they also explain a lot earlier then other centers, making it easier for students in their studies and help them cope better as they have more time to understand the topics.
Conducive environment to learn efficiently. Great teachers (especially Mr Helmindra) that teach effectively. Marks went from 81 to 94. What more is there to say.

Mr Helmi is a very helpful teacher who creates answering techniques for students to answer science questions which allows us to earn more marks during exams. He finds interesting ways to make us memorise science vocabulary easier and makes sure that his classes are not boring by sharing personal stories related to the topic that we are learning in class and tells us jokes, making lessons more enjoyable.
the admin staff is very nice and friendly. I enjoy having math lessons with Ms Pun. She taught me units and parts which is very useful. I also enjoy science lessons with Mr Helmi. üòç

The atmosphere is calming and nurturing. The teachers are attentive and receptive to students needs. Don't worry about asking questions and for extra help, as the teachers are happy to do so. Even if it takes a couple tries to understand, the teachers are patient with helping you. Their notes are succint and summarised effectively.
